mapper.sql: c.fUuid AS `uuid`, c.fUserID AS `loginName`, c.fExternalAccount AS `externalAccount`, c.fSearchEngine AS `searchEngine`, c.fEntryType AS `entryType`, c.fContactPerson AS `contactPerson`, c.fQQ AS `qq`, c.fEmail AS `email`, c.fTelphone AS `telphone`, c.fAlipay AS `alipay`, c.fPaidFee AS `paidFee`, c.fType AS `type`, c.fSaleRemark AS 'saleRemark', c.fRemark AS `remark`, c.fDailyReportIdentify AS `dailyReportIdentify`, c.fStatus AS `status`, c.fActiveHour AS `activeHour`, c.fInActiveHour AS `inActiveHour`, c.fUpdateInterval AS `updateInterval`, c.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, c.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select: SELECT c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson', c.fUuid AS 'uuid' FROM t_customer c WHERE c.fStatus = 1 AND c.fEntryType = #{customerCriteria.entryType} AND c.fUserID = #{customerCriteria.loginName} order by c.fContactPerson
